snippet.title: Trials Fusion - Welcome to the Abyss [UK]
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Abyss is now available in Trials Fusion™!

Uplay Shop http://bit.ly/1nbJ0p5
PlayStation®Network http://bit.ly/1v0lCha
Xbox One http://bit.ly/1ncBmuH
Xbox360 http://bit.ly/1s9KrEY 
Steam http://bit.ly/1pLGFgv

Ride deep below sea level with Welcome to the Abyss!

Enhance your experience underwater with:
10 new tracks
24 new track Challenges 
5 new achievements/trophies 
Dozens of new Editor Objects including Titanic statues, underwater robotics and much more!


Get the Season Pass to save over 30% on the 6 DLC Packs! More info on: http://trialsgame.com/seasonpass
